verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H1696>Speak<s%> unto the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, that they <S%H3947>bring<s%> me an <S%H8641>offering<s%>: of every <S%H376>man<s%> that gives it <S%H5068>willingly<s%> with his <S%H3820>heart<s%> you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> my <S%H8641>offering<s%>.
And this is the <S%H8641>offering<s%> which you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> of <S%H2091>them<s%>; gold, and <S%H3701>silver<s%>, and <S%H5178>brass<s%>,
And <S%H8504>blue<s%>, and <S%H713>purple<s%>, and <S%H8438>scarlet<s%>, and fine <S%H8336>linen<s%>, and <S%H5795>goats<s%>' hair,
And <S%H352>rams<s%>' <S%H5785>skins<s%> dyed <S%H119>red<s%>, and <S%H8476>badgers<s%>' <S%H5785>skins<s%>, and <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%>,
<S%H8081>Oil<s%> for the <S%H3974>light<s%>, <S%H1314>spices<s%> for <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%>, and for <S%H5561>sweet<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%>,
<S%H7718>Onyx<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%>, and <S%H68>stones<s%> to be <S%H4394>set<s%> in the <S%H646>ephod<s%>, and in the <S%H2833>breastplate<s%>.
And let them <S%H6213>make<s%> me a <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%>; that I may <S%H7931>live<s%> among <S%H8432>them<s%>.

According to all that I <S%H7200>show<s%> you after the <S%H8403>pattern<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%>, and the <S%H8403>pattern<s%> of all the <S%H3627>instruments<s%> there even so shall you make <S%H6213>it<s%>.

And they shall <S%H6213>make<s%> an <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%>: two <S%H520>cubits<s%> and a <S%H2677>half<s%> shall be the <S%H753>length<s%> there and a <S%H520>cubit<s%> and a <S%H2677>half<s%> the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> there and a <S%H520>cubit<s%> and a <S%H2677>half<s%> the height <S%H6967>there<s%>

And you shall <S%H6823>overlay<s%> it with <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%>, <S%H1004>inside<s%> and <S%H2351>outside<s%> shall you <S%H6823>overlay<s%> <S%H6213>it<s%>, and shall make upon it a <S%H2213>crown<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>.

And you shall <S%H3332>cast<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> for <S%H5414>it<s%>, and put them in the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H6471>corners<s%> there and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> shall be in the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6763>side<s%> of <S%H8147>it<s%>, and two <S%H2885>rings<s%> in the other side of <S%H8145>it<s%>.
And you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H905>poles<s%> of <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%>, and <S%H6823>overlay<s%> them with <S%H2091>gold<s%>.
And you shall <S%H935>put<s%> the <S%H905>poles<s%> into the <S%H2885>rings<s%> by the <S%H6763>sides<s%> of the <S%H727>ark<s%>, that the <S%H727>ark<s%> may be borne with <S%H5375>them<s%>.
The <S%H905>poles<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> in the <S%H2885>rings<s%> of the <S%H727>ark<s%>: they shall not be taken from <S%H5493>it<s%>.
And you shall <S%H5414>put<s%> into the <S%H727>ark<s%> the <S%H5715>testimony<s%> which I shall give <S%H5414>you<s%>

And you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> a mercy <S%H3727>seat<s%> of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%>: two <S%H520>cubits<s%> and a <S%H2677>half<s%> shall be the <S%H753>length<s%> there and a <S%H520>cubit<s%> and a <S%H2677>half<s%> the breadth <S%H7341>there<s%>

And you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3742>cherubims<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%>, of beaten <S%H4749>work<s%> shall you <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H8147>them<s%>, in the two <S%H7098>ends<s%> of the mercy <S%H3727>seat<s%>.

And <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3742>cherub<s%> on the one <S%H7098>end<s%>, and the <S%H259>other<s%> <S%H3742>cherub<s%> on the <S%H2088>other<s%> <S%H7098>end<s%>: even of the mercy <S%H3727>seat<s%> shall you <S%H6213>make<s%> the <S%H3742>cherubims<s%> on the <S%H8147>two<s%> ends <S%H7098>there<s%>

And the <S%H3742>cherubims<s%> shall <S%H6566>stretch<s%> forth their <S%H3671>wings<s%> on <S%H4605>high<s%>, <S%H5526>covering<s%> the mercy <S%H3727>seat<s%> with their <S%H3671>wings<s%>, and their <S%H6440>faces<s%> shall look <S%H376>one<s%> to <S%H251>another<s%>; toward the mercy <S%H3727>seat<s%> shall the <S%H6440>faces<s%> of the cherubims <S%H3742>be<s%>.

And you shall <S%H5414>put<s%> the mercy <S%H3727>seat<s%> <S%H4605>above<s%> upon the <S%H727>ark<s%>; and in the <S%H727>ark<s%> you shall <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H5715>testimony<s%> that I shall give <S%H5414>you<s%>

And there I will <S%H3259>proper<s%> with you and I will <S%H1696>commune<s%> with you from above the mercy <S%H3727>seat<s%>, from <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3742>cherubims<s%> which are <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony<s%>, of all things which I will give you in <S%H6680>commandment<s%> unto the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

You shall also <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H7979>table<s%> of <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%>: two <S%H520>cubits<s%> shall be the <S%H753>length<s%> there and a <S%H520>cubit<s%> the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> there and a <S%H520>cubit<s%> and a <S%H2677>half<s%> the height <S%H6967>there<s%>
And you shall <S%H6823>overlay<s%> it with <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and <S%H6213>make<s%> thereto a <S%H2213>crown<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>.

And you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> unto it a <S%H4526>border<s%> of an hand <S%H2948>breadth<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>, and you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H2213>crown<s%> to the <S%H4526>border<s%> there round <S%H5439>about<s%>.

And you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> for it <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H2885>rings<s%> in the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H6285>corners<s%> that are on the <S%H702>four<s%> feet <S%H7272>there<s%>
Over <S%H5980>against<s%> the <S%H4526>border<s%> shall the <S%H2885>rings<s%> be for <S%H1004>places<s%> of the <S%H905>poles<s%> to <S%H5375>carry<s%> the <S%H7979>table<s%>.

And you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> the <S%H905>poles<s%> of <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%>, and <S%H6823>overlay<s%> them with <S%H2091>gold<s%>, that the <S%H7979>table<s%> may be carried with <S%H5375>them<s%>.

And you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> the <S%H7086>dishes<s%> there and <S%H3709>spoons<s%> there and <S%H7184>covers<s%> there and <S%H4518>bowls<s%> there to <S%H5258>cover<s%> <S%H2004>with<s%>: of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%> shall you make <S%H6213>them<s%>.
And you shall <S%H5414>set<s%> upon the <S%H7979>table<s%> <S%H3899>showbread<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me <S%H8548>always<s%>.

And you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H4501>lampstand<s%> of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%>: of beaten <S%H4749>work<s%> shall the <S%H4501>lampstand<s%> be <S%H6213>made<s%>: his <S%H3409>shaft<s%>, and his <S%H7070>branches<s%>, his <S%H1375>bowls<s%>, his <S%H3730>buds<s%>, and his <S%H6525>flowers<s%>, shall be of the same.

And <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H7070>branches<s%> shall <S%H3318>come<s%> out of the <S%H6654>sides<s%> of <S%H7969>it<s%>; three <S%H7070>branches<s%> of the <S%H4501>lampstand<s%> out of the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6654>side<s%>, and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H7070>branches<s%> of the <S%H4501>lampstand<s%> out of the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H6654>side<s%>:

<S%H7969>Three<s%> <S%H1375>bowls<s%> made like unto <S%H8246>almonds<s%>, with a <S%H3730>bud<s%> and a <S%H6525>flower<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7070>branch<s%>; and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1375>bowls<s%> made like <S%H8246>almonds<s%> in the <S%H259>other<s%> <S%H7070>branch<s%>, with a <S%H3730>bud<s%> and a <S%H6525>flower<s%>: so in the <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H7070>branches<s%> that <S%H3318>come<s%> out of the <S%H4501>lampstand<s%>.
And in the <S%H4501>lampstand<s%> shall be <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H1375>bowls<s%> made like unto <S%H8246>almonds<s%>, with their <S%H3730>buds<s%> and their <S%H6525>flowers<s%>.

And there shall be a <S%H3730>bud<s%> under <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7070>branches<s%> of the <S%H3730>same<s%>, and a bud under <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7070>branches<s%> of the <S%H3730>same<s%>, and a bud under <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7070>branches<s%> of the <S%H8337>same<s%>, according to the six <S%H7070>branches<s%> that <S%H3318>proceed<s%> out of the <S%H4501>lampstand<s%>.
Their <S%H3730>buds<s%> and their <S%H7070>branches<s%> shall be of the <S%H259>same<s%>: all it shall be one beaten <S%H4749>work<s%> of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%>.

And you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H5216>lamps<s%> there and they shall <S%H5927>light<s%> the <S%H5216>lamps<s%> there that they may give <S%H215>light<s%> over <S%H5676>against<s%> <S%H6440>it<s%>.
And the <S%H4457>snuffers<s%> there and the <S%H4289>snuffdishes<s%> there shall be of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%>.
Of a <S%H3603>talent<s%> of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%> shall he <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H3627>it<s%>, with all these vessels.
And <S%H7200>look<s%> that you <S%H6213>make<s%> them after their <S%H8403>pattern<s%>, which was <S%H7200>showed<s%> you in the <S%H2022>mountain<s%>.
